description: Extremely low V10 values indicate high-risk transactions, often linked to stolen cards.
Low V12 values correlate with stolen card usage.
Low V3 values indicate potential fraud.
High V4 values suggest unusual spikes in transaction frequency.
High V2 values suggest unusual transaction patterns.
High V16 values suggest unusual transaction patterns.
Extremely low V14 values correlate with card-not-present fraud.
Low V17 values indicate geolocation anomalies.
Low V7 values indicate potential fraud.
